    • Method Detail

      • getFamilyName

        public final java.lang.String getFamilyName()
        Specified by:
        getFamilyName in interface QuickFix<ProblemDescriptor>
        Returns:
        text to appear in "Apply Fix" popup when multiple Quick Fixes exist (in the results of batch code inspection). For example, if the name of the quickfix is "Create template <filename>", the return value of getFamilyName() should be "Create template". If the name of the quickfix does not depend on a specific element, simply return QuickFix.getName().

      • applyFix

        public final void applyFix(Project project,
                           ProblemDescriptor descriptor)
        Description copied from interface: QuickFix
        Called to apply the fix.

        Please call com.intellij.profile.codeInspection.ProjectInspectionProfileManager#fireProfileChanged() if inspection profile is changed as result of fix.

        Specified by:
        applyFix in interface QuickFix<ProblemDescriptor>
        Parameters:
        project - Project
        descriptor - problem reported by the tool which provided this quick fix action
